sentence.Network_en: Fructification splits from nor reverse side, sometimes berry shape.
sentence.Network_cn: 果实从腹面或背面裂开, 有时浆果状.

sentence.Network_en: Fructification includes peel, seed coat, cotyledon and embryo 4 parts.
sentence.Network_cn: 果实包括果皮.种皮.子叶和胚四部分.

sentence.Network_en: Fructification flesh is qualitative globose, blue, the seed is bigger, long elliptic, black.
sentence.Network_cn: 果实肉质球形, 蓝色, 种子较大, 长椭圆形, 黑色.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 他发现了很多有用的性状并且是首先认识到结实(fructification)的分类意义的学者中之一(Gesner在他之前认识到这一点)。  但是,切查皮诺在他的加权性状的学说中完全.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from late Latin fructificatio(n-), from Latin fructificare 'fructify', from fructus 'fruit'

means.word_mean: 2. organs of fruiting (especially the reproductive parts of ferns and mosses)
